author: vors
body:
- [x] `msbuild` requirement is unnnessasary. We should use nuget package from open-sourced msbuild or pick up one from the .NET folder on the machine.: #684
- [x] we should build x64 version of `powershell.exe` (32 bit is not used anywhere): #683 
- [x] add note that we need VC++ compiler in VS 2015, not just VS 2015: #681
- [x] Tab-Completion doesn't work on `[system.manage<Tab>]` on Linux: #682

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: I should remove `--output bin` and use the default publish output. #685

title: Onboarding notes 3/16/16
